Murena is excited to expand into the Web3 world! We are looking for a Blockchain / Smart Contract Developer to help design and implement privacy-conscious smart contracts for our ecosystem. You will work on decentralized applications that complement our Android and Windows apps.

What you will do:
- Develop and deploy smart contracts on Ethereum-compatible blockchains.
- Collaborate with our product team to integrate blockchain features.
- Review code for security, scalability, and privacy.
- Suggest improvements for user-friendly blockchain interactions.

Requirements:
- Experience with Solidity, Rust, or similar blockchain languages.
- Understanding of decentralized applications (DApps) and wallets.

jobs.title: Sell My Graphic Designs

I have a growing catalogue of original graphic designs—everything from vector illustrations to social-media templates—that I’m ready to monetise. My primary sales channel will be social media, so I need a clear, actionable strategy that turns followers into customers while keeping the process manageable for one person.  

Alongside the social push, I also want to build a polished storefront on Creative Market to capture an additional stream of buyers who already search for downloadable assets there.

jobs.title: Modern Minimalist Spice Label Design
jobs.description:
I'm seeking a creative designer to craft modern, minimalist wrap-around labels for spice tins. I  have a current logo I want incorporated into the label. The spice name is “Soul Dust”. Here is the link to the container



Label Requirements:
- Style: Modern and minimalist
- Information: Ingredients list and nutrition facts
- Shape: Wrap-around style for a spice tin (Width: 3.1”, Height: 2.2”) 



Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Proven graphic design expertise, especially in label design
- Strong portfolio showcasing modern and minimalist designs
- Familiarity with nutrition facts layout and ingredient lists
- Ability to deliver print-ready files

Please include relevant samples in your bids. Thank you!
